Commands.name: t_hs
Commands.label: T-HS
Commands.description: The current temperature (TVBH) of the heat generator is displayed in C.

Commands.name: t_hs_set
Commands.label: T-HS Setpoint
Commands.description: The current Inflow target temperature of the heat generator is displayed in C

Commands.name: water_pressure
Commands.label: Water Pressure
Commands.description: The current water pressure is displayed in bar.

Commands.name: t_ext
Commands.label: T-Outside
Commands.description: The average external temperature is displayed C.

Commands.name: t_dhw
Commands.label: T-DHW
Commands.description: The current temperature of the hot water storage tank is displayed in C. If there is no hot water function activated, --- is displayed.

Commands.name: t_dhw_set
Commands.label: T-DHW Setpoint
Commands.description: The current target hot water temperature is displayed in C. If there is no hot water function activated, --- is displayed. The current set value is here always the maximum value of all relevant demands for this hot water circuit

Commands.name: t_return
Commands.label: T-Return
Commands.description: The current return flow temperature of the heat generator is displayed in C. If there is no relevant sensor connected to the heat generator, --- is displayed.

Commands.name: flow_rate
Commands.label: Flow Rate
Commands.description: The filtered value of the current volume flow in litres per hour

Commands.name: t_hc
Commands.label: T-HC
Commands.description: The inflow temperature in the direct heating circuit is displayed in C.

Commands.name: t_hc_set
Commands.label: T-HC Setpoint
Commands.description: The set temperature of the flow in the direct heating circuit is displayed in C.

Commands.name: status_pump
Commands.label: Status HS Pump
Commands.description: The current status of the internal heat circulation pump in the ROTEX HPSU compact is displayed.

Commands.name: runtime_comp
Commands.label: Runtime Compressor
Commands.description: The running time of the refrigerant compressor is displayed in h.

Commands.name: runtime_pump
Commands.label: Runtime Pump
Commands.description: The running time of the internal heating circulation pump is displayed in h.

Commands.name: posmix
Commands.label: Mixer Position
Commands.description: The current position of the 3UV DHW 3-way switch valve is displayed. 0%: position A (room heating) 100%: position B (domestic hot water generation)

Commands.name: qboh
Commands.label: Qboh
Commands.description: The amount of heat in the additional heat generator for hot water generation is displayed in kWh.

Commands.name: qchhp
Commands.label: Qchhp
Commands.description: The amount of heat in the additional heat generator for heating mode is displayed in kWh.

Commands.name: qsc
Commands.label: Qsc
Commands.description: The quantity of heat in the heat pump for cooling is displayed in kWh.

Commands.name: qch
Commands.label: Qch
Commands.description: The quantity of heat in the heat pump for heating is displayed in kWh.

Commands.name: qwp
Commands.label: QWP
Commands.description: The total amount of heat in the heat pump is displayed in kWh.

Commands.name: qdhw
Commands.label: Qdhw
Commands.description: The quantity of heat for hot water generation is displayed in kWh.

Commands.name: sw_vers_01
Commands.label: Version SW 1
Commands.description: Version SW 1

Commands.name: sw_vers_02
Commands.label: Version SW 2
Commands.description: Version SW 2

Commands.name: sw_vers_03
Commands.label: Version SW 3
Commands.description: Version SW 3

Commands.name: mode_01
Commands.label: Modo ?
Commands.description: Modo Rotex

Commands.name: tvbh2
Commands.label: TVBH2 [C]
Commands.description: Current heating inflow temperature or temp. after heating support heat exchanger (tV,BH).

Commands.name: tliq2
Commands.label: Tliq2 [C]
Commands.description: Current coolant temperature (tliq2).

Commands.name: tr2
Commands.label: TR2 [C]
Commands.description: Current heating return flow temperature, secondary sensor (tR2).

Commands.name: ta2
Commands.label: TA2 [C]
Commands.description: Actual outdoor temperature (measured by temperature sensor of the external heat pump)

Commands.name: tdhw2
Commands.label: Tdhw2 [C]
Commands.description: Current temperature in domestic hot water storage tank, secondary sensor (tDHW2).

Commands.name: quiet
Commands.label: quiet
Commands.description: Shows the status of the whisper mode.

Commands.name: mode
Commands.label: Mode
Commands.description: Current mode of the heat pump: ---: No heating or cooling demand : Heating : Cooling : Domestic hot water generation : Automatic defrosting function active

Commands.name: pump
Commands.label: Pump
Commands.description: Actual output of the internal heating circulation pump in %

Commands.name: ext
Commands.label: Ext
Commands.description: Current energy mode of the heat pump: LT: EVU function HT/NT active and low tariff. HT: EVU function HT/NT active and high tariff. SGN: EVU function SMART GRID active, normal mode. SG1: EVU function SMART GRID active, disconnection: no heat pump operation, no frost protection function. SG2: EVU function SMART GRID active, switchon recommendation, mode with higher set temperatures, cheap power. SG3: EVU function SMART GRID active, switchon command and storage tank charging to 70 C, cheap power - - -: No external mode active, heat pump works in normal mode.

Commands.name: ehs
Commands.label: EHS
Commands.description: Current output of the backup heater in kW

Commands.name: rt
Commands.label: RT
Commands.description: Parameter [Room thermostat] / [Interlink fct]

Commands.name: bpv
Commands.label: BPV
Commands.description: Current position of the mixing valve 3UVB1 (100% = A, 0% = B)

Commands.name: t_v1
Commands.label: TV
Commands.description: Current inflow temperature after the plate heat exchanger (tV1)

Commands.name: t_dhw1
Commands.label: Tdhw
Commands.description: Current temperature in domestic hot water storage tank (tDHW1)

Commands.name: t_vbh
Commands.label: TVBH
Commands.description: Current heating inflow temperature or temp. after heating support heat exchanger (tV,BH)

Commands.name: t_outdoor_ot1
Commands.label: TA
Commands.description: Actual outdoor temperature (measured by optional temperature sensor RoCon OT1)

Commands.name: t_r1
Commands.label: TR
Commands.description: Current heating return flow temperature (tR1)

Commands.name: v1
Commands.label: V
Commands.description: Actual volume flow (flow rate) in the heating system

Commands.name: t_room1_setpoint
Commands.label: T Room 1 Setpoint
Commands.description: Setpoint 1 value

Commands.name: t_room2_setpoint
Commands.label: T Room 2 Setpoint
Commands.description: Setpoint 1 value

Commands.name: t_room3_setpoint
Commands.label: T Room 3 Setpoint
Commands.description: Setpoint 1 value

Commands.name: heat_slope
Commands.label: Heat-Slope
Commands.description: Heat Slope

Commands.name: t_dhw_setpoint1
Commands.label: T-ACS nom 1
Commands.description: Nominal value of the hot water temperature in C, which is valid for the first ignition cycle

Commands.name: t_dhw_setpoint2
Commands.label: T-ACS nom 2
Commands.description: Nominal value of the hot water temperature in C, which is valid for the second ignition cycle

Commands.name: t_dhw_setpoint3
Commands.label: T-ACS nom 3
Commands.description: Nominal value of the hot water temperature in C, which is valid for the third ignition cycle

Commands.name: hyst_hp
Commands.label: Hyst HP
Commands.description: Switching threshold hot water charging. Setting of the temperature difference to which the temperature in the domestic hot water storage tank compared to the current target hot water temperature [T-DHW Setpoint] can drop before the heat pump is switched on to provide hot water

Commands.name: t_flow_cooling
Commands.label: T-Flow Cooling
Commands.description: Setting the cooling inflow target temperature (fixed value) when cooling mode is active

Commands.name: error
Commands.label: error
Commands.description: errorcode

Commands.name: outdoor_type
Commands.label: Outdoor type
Commands.description: Type exterior heat pump unit

Commands.name: indoor_unit
Commands.label: Indoor unit
Commands.description: Type of interior heat pump unit

Commands.name: func_heating
Commands.label: Function Heating
Commands.description: Setting as to whether there is an additional heat generator (WEZ) for hot water generation and heating support

Commands.name: hzu
Commands.label: HUZ
Commands.description: Heating support from domestic hot water storage tanks when the minimum temperature is exceeded

Commands.name: equi_func
Commands.label: Equilibrium Function
Commands.description: The bivalence function is relevant for operation of the optional ancillary heater based on a backup demand (room heating operation)

Commands.name: smart_grid
Commands.label: SMART GRID
Commands.description: Smart Grid

Commands.name: modus_sg
Commands.label: Mode SG
Commands.description: Only if parameter [SMART GRID] = 1:Used for a possible target temperature increase in the case of aSMART GRID start command

Commands.name: ht_nt_func
Commands.label: HT/NT Function
Commands.description: Setting which specifies which heat sources are switched off when the standard signal is received from the energy supply company (EVU) in the case of the customer having an off-peak tariff network connection

Commands.name: ht_nt_contact
Commands.label: HT/NT Contact
Commands.description: Specifies whether the HT/NT input is an NC or NO contact

Commands.name: room_therm
Commands.label: Room thermostat
Commands.description: Configuration of a room thermostat connected to the port J16 on the ROTEX HPSU compact using potential-free contacts

Commands.name: interlink
Commands.label: Interlink fct
Commands.description: Configuration for systems operating with 2 different inflow target temperatures

Commands.name: air_purge
Commands.label: Air Purge
Commands.description: Activation of automatic bleeding of the ROTEX HPSU compact and the connected heating circuit

Commands.name: max_perf_pump
Commands.label: Max Perform Pump
Commands.description: Upper limit for modulation of the pump output

Commands.name: min_perf_pump
Commands.label: Min Perform Pump
Commands.description: Lower limit for modulation of the pump output

Commands.name: outside_conf
Commands.label: Outside Config
Commands.description: Configuration of the optional external temperature sensor RoCon OT1

Commands.name: storage_conf
Commands.label: Storage Config
Commands.description: Configuration of water heating

Commands.name: pres_conf
Commands.label: Pressure Config
Commands.description: Configuring the sensor for assessment of the system water pressure

Commands.name: out_temp_adapt
Commands.label: Outside Temp Adap
Commands.description: Individual adapting for the measured value of the outdoor temperature relevant for the Controller

Commands.name: power_dhw
Commands.label: Power DHW
Commands.description: Heating output of electric auxiliary heater for hot water generation

Commands.name: buh_s1_pow
Commands.label: BUH s1 power
Commands.description: Heat capacity of the ancillary electric heater in Stage 1 heating support

Commands.name: buh_s2_pow
Commands.label: BUH s2 power
Commands.description: Heat capacity of the ancillary electric heater in Stage 2 heating support

Commands.name: power_biv
Commands.label: Power BIV
Commands.description: Setting limits the output of the heating support

Commands.name: tdiff_dhw_ch
Commands.label: TDiff-DHW CH
Commands.description: TDiff-DHW CH

Commands.name: t_vbh1_max
Commands.label: T vbh1 max
Commands.description: Setting limits the inflow temperature (measured at tV, BH) with active heating support function

Commands.name: equi_temp
Commands.label: Equilibrium Temp
Commands.description: Setting affects the operation of the potential-free AUX switching contact (toggle switch utput A) defined in the parameter [AUX Fct]

Commands.name: quiet_mode
Commands.label: Quiet Mode
Commands.description: Mode for low-noise operation with reduced output

Commands.name: aux_fct
Commands.label: AUX Fct
Commands.description: Setting assigns the switching conditions to the potential-free AUX contact (toggle switch output A)

Commands.name: aux_time
Commands.label: AUX time
Commands.description: AUX switching contact (A) switches with a delay when the switching condition is pending for longer than the set time

Commands.name: t_dhw_1_min
Commands.label: T-DHW 1 min
Commands.description: Switching threshold storage tank temperature (Tdhw) for AUX switching contact (see parameter [AUX Fct])

Commands.name: delta_t_ch
Commands.label: Delta-T CH
Commands.description: Set outdoor temperature spread The ROTEX HPSU compact heating circulation pump controls the flow rate in order to achieve the set spread between the inflow target temperature and the return flow temperature (tV, BH - tR1)

Commands.name: v_var
Commands.label: V var
Commands.description: Current minimum necessary volume flow in the system (calculated value, not configurable)

Commands.name: t_flow_ch_adj
Commands.label: T-Flow CH adj
Commands.description: Only when parameter [Interlink fct] = On. With a closed cooling RT switching contact, the inflow target temperature is increased by the set value

Commands.name: t_flow_cool_adj
Commands.label: T-Flow Cooling adj
Commands.description: Only when parameter [Interlink fct] = On. With a closed cooling RT switching contact, the cooling inflow target temperature is reduced by the set value

Commands.name: min_pressure
Commands.label: Min Pressure
Commands.description: Defines the minimum water pressure

Commands.name: max_pressure
Commands.label: Max Pressure
Commands.description: Defines the maximum water pressure

Commands.name: setpoint_pressure
Commands.label: Set Point Pressure
Commands.description: Defines the set water pressure

Commands.name: max_pressure_drop
Commands.label: Max Pressuredrop
Commands.description: Defines the maximum acceptable pressure drop in the heating system

Commands.name: hc_func
Commands.label: HC Function
Commands.description: Setting defines the type of inflow temperature control

Commands.name: t_frost_protect
Commands.label: T-Frost Protect
Commands.description: 0=No frost protection of the heating circuit, Otherwise: If the outside temperature falls below the programmed value, the system switches into the frost protection mode (switches the pumps on). The function ceases once the outside temperature has risen to the set value +1 K

Commands.name: insulation
Commands.label: Insulation
Commands.description: Setting the insulation standard of the building. This affects the way the heating curve and the heating times automatically adapt to the outside temperature.

Commands.name: screed
Commands.label: Screed
Commands.description: Function for screed drying

Commands.name: t_screed_day1
Commands.label: Temp screed day 1
Commands.description: Setting the procedural program for screed heating. An individual inflow temperature can be set for each day for a maximum period of 28 days. The end of the screed programme is defined by the 1st. Day at target value setting

Commands.name: t_screed_day2
Commands.label: Temp screed day 2
Commands.description: Setting the procedural program for screed heating. An individual inflow temperature can be set for each day for a maximum period of 28 days. The end of the screed programme is defined by the 1st. Day at target value setting

Commands.label: Temp screed day 3
Commands.description: Setting the procedural program for screed heating. An individual inflow temperature can be set for each day for a maximum period of 28 days. The end of the screed programme is defined by the 1st. Day at target value setting

Commands.label: Temp screed day 28
Commands.description: Setting the procedural program for screed heating. An individual inflow temperature can be set for each day for a maximum period of 28 days. The end of the screed programme is defined by the 1st. Day at target value setting

Commands.name: t_out_lim_day
Commands.label: T-Outside lim day
Commands.description: Setting the procedural program for screed heating. An individual inflow temperature can be set for each day for a maximum period of 28 days. The end of the screed programme is defined by the 1st. Day at target value setting

Commands.name: t_out_lim_night
Commands.label: T-Outside lim night
Commands.description: Parameter for setting the heating limit for "Switch-off" of the heating circuit during economy mode

Commands.name: t_flow_day
Commands.label: T-Flow Day
Commands.description: Setting the inflow target temperature for the heating circuit during the heating time when in operating mode: "Automatic 1", "Automatic 2", "Heating

Commands.name: t_flow_night
Commands.label: T-Flow night
Commands.description: Setting the inflow target temperature for the heating circuit during the setback time when in operating mode: "Automatic 1", "Automatic 2", "Reducing

Commands.name: max_t_flow
Commands.label: Max T-Flow
Commands.description: The inflow temperature determined for the heating circuit is limited to the maximum value set here

Commands.name: min_t_flow
Commands.label: Min T-Flow
Commands.description: The inflow temperature determined for the heating circuit is limited to the minimum value set here

Commands.name: hc_adapt
Commands.label: HC Adaption
Commands.description: HC Adapation

Commands.name: start_tout_cool
Commands.label: Start T-Out Cooling
Commands.description: Setting from which outside temperature the cooling operation with the highest cooling infeed target temperature

Commands.name: max_tout_cool
Commands.label: Max T-Out Cooling
Commands.description: Setting to determine from which outdoor temperature the lowest cooling flow temperature

Commands.name: t_flow_cool_start
Commands.label: T-Flow Cooling start
Commands.description: Setting the cooling inflow target temperature at the start of cooling mode

Commands.name: t_flow_cool_max
Commands.label: T-Flow Cooling max
Commands.description: Setting the minimum cooling inflow target temperature. This is kept constant relative to the outside temperature

Commands.name: min_t_flow_cool
Commands.label: Min T-Flow Cooling
Commands.description: Setting the absolute lower limit of the cooling inflow target temperature. The limitation is effective if a lower cooling inflow target temperature is determined based on other parameter settings

Commands.name: t_flow_cool
Commands.label: T-Flow Cooling
Commands.description: Setting the cooling inflow target temperature (fixed value) when cooling mode is active

Commands.name: cool_setpoint_adj
Commands.label: Cooling Setpoint adj
Commands.description: Parallel displacement of the cooling characteristic curve to match the set value

Commands.name: circ_pump_dhw
Commands.label: Circl-Pump DHW
Commands.description: Setting for activating a circulation pump

Commands.name: circ_pump_interval
Commands.label: Circl-Pump Interval
Commands.description: Setting the interval control for an optional circulation pump

Commands.name: anti_leg_day
Commands.label: Anti-Legionella day
Commands.description: Setting the day for the thermal disinfection of the circulating tank

Commands.name: anti_leg_time
Commands.label: Anti-Legionella time
Commands.description: Setting the start time of the thermal disinfection of the hot water circulating tank

Commands.name: anti_leg_temp
Commands.label: Anti-Legionella temp
Commands.description: Setting the hot water target temperature during thermal disinfection of the hot water circulating tank

Commands.name: max_dhw_loading
Commands.label: Max DHW loading
Commands.description: Setting limits the time period for hot water generation to the set target value

Commands.name: dhw_off_time
Commands.label: DHW Off Time
Commands.description: Setting the block time following completion or interruption of a hot water generation cycle. New demand of hot water generation is satisfied only after expiry of this block time

Commands.name: one_hot_water
Commands.label: 1x Hot Water
Commands.description: Start of the one-off heating up of the hot water and the set value [T-DHW Setpoint 1], independent of the heating programmes

Commands.name: timer_boh
Commands.label: Timer BOH
Commands.description: Delay time after which the reserve heating may support the heat pump in hot water charging

Commands.name: t_reduced
Commands.label: T-Reduced
Commands.description: Target room temperature for the setback times for the permanent timer programmes [Automatic 1] and [Automatic 2]

Commands.name: t_absence
Commands.label: T-Absence
Commands.description: Target room temperature for the setback times for the temporary timer programmes  [Away] and [Vacation]

Commands.name: t_room
Commands.label: T-Room
Commands.description: Room temperature measured by an optional Rocon U1 room station
